definition: Strekker armen for å vise noe i hånden?
Translation: Does the arm stretch to show something in his hand?

definition: Rekker deg en leke hun/han holder?
Translation: Do you play a game she / he holds?

definition: Peker på noe som fanger oppmerksomheten?
Translation: Pointing to something that catches attention?

definition: Vinker ha det på egen hånd når noen drar?
Translation: Waving it on its own when someone goes?

definition: Strekker armene opp for å bli løftet?
Translation: Are your arms raised to be lifted?
Shakes your head for "no"?
Nods to "yes?"

definition: Gestikulerer hysj ved fingeren mot munnen?
Translation: Gesticulates hoist by finger to mouth?

definition: Vil ha noe ved å strekke armen og åpne og lukke hånden?
Translation: Want something to stretch your arm and open and close your hand?
Sending slangkyss?

definition: Smatter med leppene - nam-nam- for å vise at noe smaker godt?
Translation: Does your lips smell - nam-nam- to show that something tastes good?

definition: Trekker på skuldrene for å vise at man ikke vet?
Translation: Pulls your shoulders to show that you do not know?

definition: Extiende su brazo para mostrarle algo que tiene en la mano.
Translation: Extends his arm to show him something he has in his hand.

definition: Trata de alcanzar o darle algún juguete u objeto que tiene en la mano.
Translation: Try to reach or give a toy or object that you have in your hand.

definition: Señala (con la mano y el dedo índice extendidos) algún objeto o situación.
Translation: Point out (with your hand and forefinger extended) some object or situation.

definition: Dice “adiós” con la mano cuando alguien se va sin que se la pida que lo haga.
Translation: He says "goodbye" with his hand when someone leaves without being asked to do so.

definition: Levanta los brazos para que lo levanten.
Translation: Raise your arms to be lifted.

definition: Hace el gesto de “no” con su cabeza.
Translation: He makes the "no" gesture with his head.

definition: Hace el gesto de “sí” con su cabeza.
Translation: He makes the "yes" gesture with his head.

definition: Hace el gesto de “shhh” (callar) con su dedo enfrente de la boca.
Translation: He makes the "shhh" (silent) gesture with his finger in front of his mouth.

definition: Extiende su mano, a veces acompañado de un gemido u otro sonido para pedir algo.
Translation: Extend your hand, sometimes accompanied by a moan or other sound to ask for something.
He blows kisses.

definition: Aprieta los labio como manera de decir “mmmm” cuando algo está sabroso.
Translation: Squeeze the lip as a way of saying "mmmm" when something is tasty.

definition: Levanta los hombros y/o extiendo sus manos hacia los lados como para decir “dónde está” o “se fue”.
Translation: Lift your shoulders and / or extend your hands to the sides as if to say "where is" or "left".

definition: Llama a alguien con la mano haciendo el gesto de “ven”.
Translation: Call someone with your hand making the "come" gesture.

definition: Mostra all'adulto ciò che ha in mano
Translation: Show the adult what he has in his hand

definition: Dà all'adulto ciò che ha in mano
Translation: Give the adult what he has in his hand

definition: Richiede un oggetto stendendo il braccio
Translation: Requires an object by stretching the arm

definition: Indica un oggetto o un evento
Translation: Indicates an object or an event
He makes goodbye with his hand

definition: Alza le braccia per farsi prendere su
Translation: Raise your arms to get caught up

definition: Fa "no" con la testa o con il dito
Translation: Does "no" with the head or the finger
He "yes" with his head
Fa "sch" ("silence") with the index on the lips

definition: Soffia per far capire che qualcosa scotta
Translation: Blows to make it clear that something is hot

definition: Gira il dito sulla guancia per dire "è buono"
Translation: Turn your finger on your cheek to say "it's good"

definition: Alza le spalle perché qualcosa non c'è più
Translation: He shrugs because something is gone
He nods his head at the sign of consent (yes).

definition: Žiada niečo vystretou rukou smerom k vám prípadne otvára a zatvára prsty do dlane (daj).
Translation: He asks for a hand that is stretched out towards you or he opens and closes his fingers in his palm.

definition: Vystiera ruky smerom k vám aby ste ho zobrali k sebe / hore (na ruky).
Translation: Draw your hands towards you to take it up to the top of your hand.

definition: Udrie dlaňou/rukou o podložku ako znak ukončenia činnosti (hotovo/tak).
Translation: Wets the palm / hand on the washer as an end-of-action sign (done / done).
He sways with his hand / palm.

definition: Naťahuje sa v smere žiadaného predmetu rukou / celým telom.
Translation: It is stretched in the direction of the desired item by hand / whole body.

definition: Ukazuje prázdne dlane na znak “nie je”/”nemám”.
Translation: Shows blank palm to "not" / "do not" character.

definition: Otáča hlavou na znak nesúhlasu odmietnutia (nie).
Translation: Turns his head to the disapproval disapproval character (not).
It handles articles to others.
He sends his knees away.
The pointer touches the lips indicating "psst" (silence).

definition: Ukazovákom alebo celou rukou ukazuje na predmet osobu.
Translation: The marker or all the hand shows the subject.

definition: Ukazuje predmet ktorý drží v ruke inej osobe (aha! / pozri; čo mám).
Translation: Shows the item that holds in hand to another person (ah! / See what I have).

definition: Vyjadrí pohybom že sa mu niečo páči alebo mu niečo chutí.
Translation: He expresses the movement that he likes something or likes something.

definition: Džavoce a rozhadzuje pri tom rukami výrazne gestikuluje (ako keby niečo vysvetľovalo).
Translation: Jawce and throws his hand with great gestures (as if something explains).
Shows the subject and says "yes".

definition: Ukáže na predmet a pomenuje ho. (Napr. Ukáže na čaj a povie “čaj”).
Translation: Shows the subject and names it. (Eg He shows for tea and says "tea").

definition: Ukáže (na) predmet a pomenuje osobu ktorej predmet patrí. (Napr. ukáže na mamine šaty a povie “mama”.)
Translation: Shows the subject and names the subject of the subject. (For example, she will show her mother's dress and say "mother.")
Mama hands and says "she gets drunk".

definition: Ukáže na nejaké miesto a povie “tam”.
Translation: He points to some place and says "there".
Serves the subject and says "there".
He is threatened with a prick and says "nono"!

definition: Ukazuje na predmet a odmietavo krúti hlavou.
Translation: Shows the subject and refuses to shake his head.

definition: Podáva predmet a pomenúva osobu od ktorej očakáva pomoc.
Translation: It handles the subject and names the person from whom he expects his help.
Other (write):
Stretch out an arm (e.g., to reach for something far)
Give something to someone
Point to something (e.g., with your finger, to draw attention to it)
Wave (hand, e.g., to say hi or bye bye)
Ask for a hug
Refuse (e.g., say no)
Accept (e.g., say yes/okay)
Put finger on your lips to signal "you have to be quiet"
Request
Kiss
Signal that something is delicious
Signal "Nothing here"/"All gone"

definition: agiter la main de sa propre initiative en signe d'aurevoir quand quelqu'un s'en va
Translation: shake your hand on your own as a sign of goodbye when someone goes away

definition: demander quelque chose en étendant ses bras et en ouvrant et fermant la main
Translation: ask for something by extending your arms and opening and closing your hand
send kisses away

definition: faire chut en plaçant son doigt sur ses lèvres
Translation: to fall by placing his finger on his lips

definition: faire mmm avec ses lèvres pour dire que quelque chose est bon
Translation: do mmm with his lips to say that something is good

definition: hausser les épaules pour dire ils sont partis ou où sont-ils?
Translation: shrug their shoulders to say they're gone or where are they?

definition: hocher la tête pour dire oui
Translation: nod your head to say yes

definition: monter (avec le bras et l'index tendus) un objet ou un évènement intéressant
Translation: mount (with your arm and forefinger stretched) an interesting object or event

definition: secouer la tête pour dire non
Translation: shake your head to say no

definition: tendre la main pour vous donner un jouet ou objet qu'il tient
Translation: reach out to give you a toy or object that he holds

definition: tendre les bras pour vous montrer quelque chose qu'il tient dans sa main
Translation: reach out to show you something he is holding in his hand

definition: tendre les bras quand il désire être porté
Translation: reach out when he wants to be worn
